txt.en: These savage cats are predators of a particularly vicious and undiscerning nature. The Lossoth make sure to respect their territory during the hunt, lest they become a meal for these deadly creatures. Likewise what livestock they raise is under constant threat by these voracious beasts.

What the sabre-tooth cat lacks in terms of packs and numbers to the Warg, it more than makes up for in sheer power and ferocity. These deadly hunters seem to relish stalking their prey through the long, cold winter nights, and though you have fought them many times before, you still get the nagging feeling that one of them is due to catch you off-guard some time soon....
